titleStmt.title: R. E. Colllins et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG6155

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: His Eccelency the Govenor of the Commonwealth of Ky, your Petitioner Peter Brawner maks known to your honer that at the October term of the Franklin Circuit Court he was find in a Sum of Sixty dollars for Selling whiskey by the retail he not being at Court Judgment went against him by defalt he further Sais that he did rent to one William Warfield one room of the house occupied by him and that the Said warfield did Sell whiskey by the retail for a short time and that he himself had no interest in the whiskey what Ever and humbly Preys your honor that the fine may be remitted

P. S. We whose names are undersigned makes Known to your honer that we are well acquainted with your Petitioner Peter Brawner and regard him as a Peaceable and industrious young man yiet under the age of twenty one years and is a pore orfan boy with neither father nor mother and we think ^he^ is not disposed to violate the Laws of his counetry in any Respect what Ever and we do hope your Simpathies may be extended to your Petitioner and the fine may be remited is the Prayer of your Petitioners

R E Collins D S
Lloyd Hackett
W Franklin
H B Innes
R A Semones
Enoch Brewar
Jos Duvall
L Scott
John Childers
Larkin Chisholm
Thomas ^X^ Brewer
William Brewer
Elijah M Hopper
Allen Burns
C. Callaghan
John O Connell

Franklin Cir Ct
vs
Peter Brawner
$60
Remit
15th Feby/65
